Word.word_CHN: 不存在可处理此工序的机台计划
不存在符合任务工序参数的机台计划

Word.word_ENG: The department of task and machine plan not match
Word.word_CHN: 不存在指定部门的机台（其它条件符合)

Word.word_ENG: the idle time of task invalid
Word.word_CHN: 最大等待时间小于最小等待时间

Word.word_ENG: The task was assigned to the wrong machine plan
Word.word_CHN: Planning过程中违反违约束，被分配到错误的机台

Word.word_ENG: the tasks sequence is violate in a same lot
Word.word_CHN: Planning过程中违反违约束，同一批次中，相轮两任务的加工次序颠倒

Word.word_ENG: the tasks was not in the start time and end time of machine plan
Word.word_CHN: Planning过程中违反违约束，开始与结束时间被排成机台计划的可用时间段以外

Word.word_ENG: The first task in a machine plan is not the first task of a lot
Word.word_CHN: Planning过程中违反违约束，机台计划的首个任务不是批次的首个任务

Word.word_ENG: The non-source task in lot has a arrival time(shouldn't have)
Word.word_CHN: 批次的非首个任务其到达时间非空

Word.word_ENG: The tasks was not initialized by planner
Word.word_CHN: 任务未被分配到任何机台
任务存在多于一个相同的属性名称
任务的预计到达时间不正确
